taskbody.context: To view or change your personal information in MyPack Portal:

step.info:
On the Personal Information tile, you will be able to view and update all of your personal information, including:
Personal Details
Contact Details
Addresses
Emergency Contacts
Text/Email Notification Setup
Ethnicity
Privacy Restrictions
Residency
Veterans Information
OIS Compliance Verification
Provide Social Security Number
Parent and Guardian Access
